channel.title: Java/Javac - Compiling Error! - Help Needed
channel.description:
Okay well I'm attempting to code a server and shit, and so far everything is going well but when I go to compile it says this:
'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and the code I have for the compiler is this: [code]@echo off title Compiler Javac *.java pause[/code] I have Java(TM) 6 Update 23 & Java(TM) SE Development Kit 6 Update 23. And all my Java files are located in D:\rs How can I fix the compiler so it actually compiles.

item.title: Java/Javac - Compiling Error! - Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @V.I.P V.I.P.
item.description:
@V.I.P wrote:

Okay well I’m attempting to code a server and shit, and so far everything is going well but when I go to compile it says this:

'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

and the code I have for the compiler is this:

@echo off title Compiler Javac *.java pause

I have Java™ 6 Update 23 & Java™ SE Development Kit 6 Update 23. And all my Java files are located in D:\rs

How can I fix the compiler so it actually compiles.

Read full topic
